name: api_math_Vector2

properties.name: magnitude
properties.description: Returns the length of this vector (Read Only).

properties.name: normalized
properties.description: Returns a normalized vector based on the current vector. The normalized vector has a magnitude of 1 and is in the same direction as the current vector. Returns a zero vector If the current vector is too small to be normalized.

properties.name: sqrMagnitude
properties.description: Returns the squared length of this vector (Read Only).
